_instructions.access_token: Your LinkedIn OAuth 2.0 access token with r_liteprofile and w_member_social scopes
_instructions.person_id: Your LinkedIn person ID (can be obtained from /v2/people/~)

_setup_instructions: 2. Create a new app or use an existing one
3. Add 'Sign In with LinkedIn' and 'Share on LinkedIn' products
5. Use the LinkedIn OAuth flow to get an access token
6. Get your person ID from the /v2/people/~ endpoint
7. Replace the placeholder values above with your actual credentials
